scan_metadata.description: neptune - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if cluster backups are enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster backups are enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if tags are copied to snapshots
check_functions.description: Verifies tags are copied to cluster snapshots

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if deletion protection is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster deletion protection is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if IAM authentication is enabled
check_functions.description: Verifies IAM authentication is enabled for cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CloudWatch Logs integration
check_functions.description: Checks if CloudWatch Logs integration is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if cluster is multi-AZ
check_functions.description: Verifies cluster is deployed in multi-AZ mode

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if cluster snapshots are public
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster snapshots are publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if cluster snapshots are encrypted
Code Executable - API call to check if cluster storage is encrypted
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster storage is encrypted

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if cluster uses public subnet
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster is using a public subnet

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check IAM roles for DB cluster
check_functions.description: Verifies IAM roles assigned to DB cluster
